metadata.Plot: A Soviet Russian lady officer, a Chinese peasant and a Japanese schoolgirl must walk their way out of a forest toward the end of World War II, despite their mutual distrust of one another.
metadata.Actors: Eddie Eagle, Dalong Fu, Anna Generalova
